hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="heapster" published_version="1.5.1"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi # Install the Dependencies # Install the Dependencies sudo zypper update -y cat /etc/issue sudo zypper install -y tar wget gcc
cd $HOME #Install go wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin
cd /usr/bin sudo ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc go version
#Build and install Heapster sudo zypper install -y git make wget gcc tar export GOPATH=$HOME export PATH=$HOME/bin:$PATH sudo rm -rf $HOME/src/k8s.io/ mkdir -p $HOME/src/k8s.io/
#Install godep go get github.com/tools/godep
#Download Heapster source code cd $HOME/src/k8s.io/ git clone https://github.com/kubernetes/heapster.git cd heapster git checkout tags/v1.5.1
#Build Heapster cd $HOME/src/k8s.io/heapster make ARCH=s390x
#Run test cases make test-unit test-unit-cov ARCH=s390x
#Verification ./heapster --version | grep 1.5.1
